title: Constructively Aligned Curriculum for Business Strategy Design and Data Analysis Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business administration and statistics knowledge, experience in data processing using Excel or Python/R
context.additional_context: Project-Based Learning Using Real Corporate Data to Strengthen Employment Relevance

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model business strategy problems using real-world corporate data and propose optimal decision-making solutions.
Learners can visually represent data analysis results and derive strategic insights through project-based assessments.
Learners can analyze consistency between educational objectives and assessment criteria based on constructive alignment principles and write a self-evaluation report.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
